```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(gdata)
library(ggrepel)
library(dplyr)
```


###Import dataset and add two new columns

Add two new columns named Latitude and Longitude to later use for ggmap function.

```{r import, echo=FALSE}

site_data <- read.csv("city-state-county.csv")
site_data$Collecting[site_data$City=="Atlanta"] <- "Non-Collecting"
site_data[c("Latitude", "Longitude")] <- NA
site_data
```
